title: Quarkus gRPC Integration Guide
summary: The documentation covers how Quarkus integrates gRPC for high-performance RPC in various languages and frameworks, suitable for microservice architectures. It details implementing and consuming gRPC services within Quarkus, supporting features like HTTP/2, TLS, mutual authentication, and xDS integration. Key aspects include reactive support and in-process gRPC development using Vert.x. Links to getting started guides, service implementation and consumption, Kubernetes deployment, and reference guides are provided.
